greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Difference between the number of nonnegative evil and odious multiples of n less than 2^n.
comment: It appears that for n = 2^i*p, i>0, p prime, a(n) = p^(2^i) or a multiple of it.
For which n is a(n) negative?
For prime n and related conjectures, see A133954.
results.author: _Ralf Stephan_, Aug 31 2013
